### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Action On Harm

---



[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_harm)

Execute actions for each bit of damage dealt to a target when compared to a specific value.

Type ID: `apugli:action_on_harm`




---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "apugli:action_on_harm",
    "bientity_action": {
        "type": "apoli:actor_action",
        "action": {
            "type": "apoli:exhaust",
            "amount": 0.5
        }
    },
    "amount_to_trigger": 2.0
}
```
This example causes a power holder to exhaust for every 2 damage points it deals to other entities.

cooldown.description: The number of ticks the entity has to wait between uses of this power.
cooldown.markdownDescription: The number of ticks the entity has to wait between uses of this power.

hud_render.description: Determines how the resource is visualized on the HUD.
hud_render.markdownDescription: Determines how the resource is visualized on the HUD.

damage_condition.description: If specified, a damage condition that must be met by the damage source of the attack for any actions of this power to be run.
damage_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, a damage condition that must be met by the damage source of the attack for any actions of this power to be run.

entity_action.description: If specified, an entity action that is executed on the power holder each trigger.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, an entity action that is executed on the power holder each trigger.

bientity_action.description: If specified, a bi-entity action that is executed with the power holder as the actor and the damaged target as the target each trigger.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, a bi-entity action that is executed with the power holder as the actor and the damaged target as the target each trigger.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the damaged target as the target for any actions of this power to be run.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, a bi-entity condition that must be met with the power holder as the actor and the damaged target as the target for any actions of this power to be run.

amount_to_trigger.description: The damage amount required for this power to trigger each individual time.
amount_to_trigger.markdownDescription: The damage amount required for this power to trigger each individual time.

overflow.description: Whether the power will run the extra actions if a killed entity takes more damage than what was required to kill them.
overflow.markdownDescription: Whether the power will run the extra actions if a killed entity takes more damage than what was required to kill them.
